ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectMicheline Poulin Remission Order
PrecisINDIVIDUAL REMISSION ORDER remits all interest - calculated as of December 20, 2010 to be in the amount of $4,657.34 - and a penalty in the amount of $106.98, paid or payable under Part I of the Income Tax Act by MICHELINE POULIN for the 1987 taxation year, and all relevant interest on that interest and penalty.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2011-0064 Publication Date: 2011-08-17
AttachmentsAttachment
